execution_plan.description: Get the distinct customer IDs that have placed orders from the Orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve first name, middle initial and last name for customers whose IDs are NOT in the set of customers who placed orders (i.e., customers with no orders).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id, customer_first_name, customer_middle_initial, customer_last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN ($step1.customer_id);
